summary: adds my second vintage follower, Valentina (i admit the images are not very good but she is actually very customed and very gorgeous
descriptionHtml:
Requirements/Credits
Enhanced Character Edit by tktk
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951 
EOCC ILoveOrcy by Vintage9
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24218
Hair Packs of TES IV Oblivion by  radioragae
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110

to install just dump the esp into your data files :) easy as that ^^

to start you off solve the riddle
With death
Healed souls
In catacombs
They lie
Eternal ground
Ruins not a chance
Until then you see
Nightmares reach

Halls
Of Course
They are here
Dead people...are near
author: Vintage9
